Name: team_availability
Description: The total assigned effort for a team member cannot exceed their availability.

Name: sprint_capacity
Description: The total story points in a sprint backlog must not exceed the team's velocity.

Name: critical_blocker
Description: No task with a 'Critical' severity blocker can be in status 'In Progress'.

Name: role_requirement
Description: Every user story must have at least one team member assigned with a required role.

Name: budget_constraint
Description: The total cost of the project must not exceed the allocated budget.

Name: sprint_duration
Description: Sprint length must be between 1 and 4 weeks.

Name: definition_of_done
Description: All tasks for a user story must be 'Done' for the story to be 'Done'.

Name: product_owner_approval
Description: No feature can be added to a release plan without Product Owner approval.

Name: skill_requirement
Description: A task requiring a certified skill can only be assigned to a worker with that certification.

Name: min_velocity
Description: The team's calculated velocity must be greater than a minimum threshold.
